LoanRequestID.title: String
LoanRequestID.description: The ID for this loan request. Should be a UUID.

ApproverName.title: String
ApproverName.description: The name of the person whom made this approval decision.

LoanManualDecisionTimestamp.title: String
LoanManualDecisionTimestamp.description: The timestamp at which this manual loan decision was made.

title: LoanManuallyApproved
description: Represents an event that a loan request has been approved manually.
